page.title: 10THE GARDEN SHOP,ALLET,TRURO.
page.content: Two Burrows Garden Shop sells garden plants, cut flowers & vegetables. Of the 10 acres, 5 are cultivated, some under glass, 5 are rough grass which the owner's son will drain & develop. The owners live in Threemilestone, having tried for 14 years to obtain planning permission for a dwelling at the Allet site; this has now been granted for their son to build a bungalow. The shop is a family concern & employs 1 girl, formerly a Youth Training Scheme student.The wide range of produce is attractively displayed on stalls with a small parking area beside the B3284. It attracts passing trade, & many regular shoppers from several miles around. The owners enjoy meeting lots of people. Work involves all aspects of gardening & selling.In the words of the owners,"it's all work & no pay!".....but enjoyable.
